sections.heading: Authority, defined.Authority means the Nebraska Educational, Health, Cultural, and Social Services Finance Authority created by the Nebraska Educational, Health, Cultural, and Social Services Finance Authority Act or any board, body, commission, department, or office succeeding to the principal func
sections.text: Authority, defined.Authority means the Nebraska Educational, Health, Cultural, and Social Services Finance Authority created by the Nebraska Educational, Health, Cultural, and Social Services Finance Authority Act or any board, body, commission, department, or office succeeding to the principal functions thereof or to whom the powers conferred upon such authority by the act are given by law.SourceLaws 1981, LB 321, § 4;Laws 1993, LB 465, § 4;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-2904;Laws 1995, LB 5, § 4;R.S.1943, (2008), § 85-1704;Laws 2013, LB170, § 4;Laws 2019, LB224, § 4.
